content: sl1 chain 3s sl1** single_crochet 3s sl1 at the top of the tc of the previous round single_crochet 4s* repeat *-* all the way around round 9 weave in ends place the crown over a suitable size cylinder or cone i used a large roll of paper towel covered with a plastic bag stiffen with a suitable media such as mod podge stiffy starch spray or sugar solution allow to dry in place re-apply as needed if you re not concerned about a choking hazard children under 3 yrs you can add more beads or jewels at this point by sewing or gluing © 2015 lotta kiuru-ribar page 2 of 2 all rights reserved
